scripts.postinstall: npm run install:all && cd angular-app-which-uses-angularlibrary && npm run bump && npm start
scripts.start: cd angular-app-which-uses-angularlibrary && npm run bump && npm start
scripts.install:all: npm run install:vanillajslibrary && npm run install:angularlibrary && npm run install:app
scripts.install:vanillajslibrary: cd vanillajslibrary && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:angularlibrary: cd angularlibrary && npm install && npm run build
